text: ۞ وَلَوۡ أَرَادُواْ ٱلۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّواْ لَهُۥ عُدَّةٗ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ ٱقۡعُدُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ
translation: Muvugishwamana! Iyo indyarya zishaka kujana na we ku rugamba, zari kurwitegurira bikwiye mu gutegekanya impamba n’igitwazi, ariko Imana Allah mu vyagezwe ntiyashimye ko mujana, Iraheza Iraziremereza zibwirwa ziti: “Nimusibe ku rugamba, mugume mu zanyu hamwe n’abarekuriwe kuzigumamwo[11]”.
footnotes: [11] Abarekuriwe kutaja ku rugamba, bakaba boguma muhira, ni abageze mu zabukuru, abarwaye, abakenyezi n’abana.
